name: sequencing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of combining things in a particular order, or discovering the order in which they are combined: A common sign of dyslexia is that the sequencing of letters when spelling words may be incorrect.
biology
  specialized the process of discovering the order in which nucelotides (= chemical substances) are combined within DNA: DNA sequencing is giving us important new insights into biology and disease.
